sentences.en: A ( non - removable ) printed circuit board to which other ( remov able ) printed circuit boards connect.
sentences.cn: 一种 ( 固定的 ) 印制电路板,其它的印制板电路板就连到这块板上.

sentences.en: A removable ticketing desk and screen bulletin are placed underneath the staircase.
sentences.cn: 可移动售票台和屏幕公告被放在楼梯下面.

sentences.en: a sofa with removable cloth covers
Click on removable drive, double - click on the video file to watch.
sentences.cn: 点击可移动磁盘, 选中文件双击即可在电脑上还原录像文件.

sentences.en: Digital cameras store their images on removable memory cards.
sentences.cn: 数码相机将图像存储在可卸载的记忆卡里.

sentences.en: Flanges are used extensively for connections where removable system components are designed.
sentences.cn: 法兰作为连接方式广泛应用在设计要求可拆卸系统部件的地方.

sentences.en: Handrailings shall be removable where required by the detailed design.
sentences.cn: 在需要详细设计的地方应去掉扶手.

sentences.en: Introduces the application of removable insulating plate and gunned lining in Chang - gang.
sentences.cn: 介绍了脱包隔热衬板及喷补内衬工艺在长钢的应用.

sentences.en: Key removable in locked position only. Spring loaded clip - in pawl.
sentences.cn: 只能在锁住位置时取出钥匙, 弹簧加载的嵌入式掣子.

sentences.en: Objective To increase the retention and stability of traditional removable partial denture.
sentences.cn: 目的:改进常规可摘局部义齿设计的不足,增进固位、稳定.

sentences.en: Other options include xenon headlamps, a removable hardtop and GPS navigation.
sentences.cn: 其他配选配置还包含了疝气大灯 、 可硬顶篷和GPS导航系统.

sentences.en: Pit - A non - removable imperfection found on the surface of a wafer.
sentences.cn: 深坑 - 一种晶圆片表面无法消除的缺陷.

sentences.en: Removable bridge plug is an oil filed down - hole plugging tool.
sentences.cn: 可取式桥塞是一种油田用井下封堵工具.

sentences.en: Removable device data recovery software is a non - destructive and read only application.
sentences.cn: 卸除式装置的数据恢复软件是一种 非 破坏性和只读的应用.

sentences.en: Restrict accesses to local hard disks, floppies, CD - ROMs, and removable disks.
sentences.cn: 限制访问本地硬盘, 软盘, 光盘, 和可移动磁盘.

sentences.en: This vulnerability is most likely to be exploited through removable drives.
sentences.cn: 此漏洞是最有可能通过利用可移动驱动器.
